adapters.name: adapter-aws_ec2
adapters.configurationNotes: In order to run the workflows in this Pre-Built Automation, the adapter property xmlArrayKeys must be added to the AWS EC2 adapter configuration with value as seen below: ```json "xmlArrayKeys": [ "item" ] ``` This will ensure all response objects will set the data type of any instance of property item to an array, even if a single element is assigned to the property.

capabilities.capability: The workflow is used to destroy VPC And EC2 Instance in AWS

entryPoint.name: Destroy VPC and EC2 Instance - AWS

apiLinks.title: Describe VPCs - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation for details of one ore more VPCs

apiLinks.title: Describe Instances - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation getting details of specified instances or all instances

apiLinks.title: Describe Internet Gateways - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation getting details of internet gateways

apiLinks.title: Detach Internet Gateway - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation for detaching an internet gateway from a VPC, disabling connectivity between the internet and the VPC

apiLinks.title: Delete Internet Gateway - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation for deleting an internet gateway

apiLinks.title: Delete Security Group - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation for deleting a security group in AWS EC2

apiLinks.title: Delete VPC - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation for deleting a specified VPC. You must detach or delete all gateways and resources that are associated with the VPC before you can delete it

apiLinks.title: Terminate Instances - AWS EC2
apiLinks.description: Documentation for shutting down the specified instances

name: Destroy VPC And EC2 Instance - AWS
overview: A modular workflow that automates destroying a VPC and EC2 Instance in AWS
webName: Destroy VPC And EC2 Instance - AWS
